title: Children splashing and swimming in Korang Stream near Chak Shahzad, seeking relief from the extreme heat wave hit the federal capital as the temperature soared 42°C in federal capital
content:
APP30-260624
ISLAMABAD: June 26– A youngster jumping into stream of water to cool himself off near Chak
Shahzad during an extreme hot weather as temperatures soared 42°C in federal capital.
